channel.title: Lost-Legacy
channel.description:
[size=36pt][b]Links[/b][/size]
[ul][li][size=14pt][font=arial][b]Website: [url=http://lost-legacy.com]http://lost-legacy.com[/url][/b][/font][/size][/li] [li][b][size=14pt]Forums: [url=http://lost-legacy.com/forum]http://lost-legacy.com/forum[/url][/size][/b][/li] [li][size=14pt][b]Download: [url=http://lost-legacy.com/client/Lost-Legacy.jar]http://lost-legacy.com/client/Lost-Legacy.jar[/url][/b][/size][/li][/ul]
Lost-Legacy is a 317 server loading higher revision data, we mix our data giving you different revisions of maps and items so that we can optimise our content.
At Lost-Legacy we strive for perfection, we understand even the smallest bug is important and we gain great pleasure from being able to confidently say we update more than almost any other server out there and we plan to keep it this way, don't believe us? Check up our update board! Our staff team at Lost-Legacy comes with a vast amount of experience and professionalism and are always looking to help, even us owners will dedicate a portion of our busy day to come in-game and answer questions and communicate with the players as we believe this to be part of the key to a successful and thriving community. So come join us, check us out and see what you're missing out on. We're full of unique fun content and you may even make a friend or two.
I hope you will enjoy the server. :)
Some popular features of our server:
Dwarf Multicannon 30+ Achievements [Beginner, Easy, Medium] Team Dungeoneering Social Slayer (Duo Slayer) Daily Updates Full Summoning Skill Fully functional bank tabs Complete clan chat system [Correct RS Lootshare] Two Quests Soulwars Flawless combat Perfected farming system All skills besides construction Customizable Client (474, 562 Gameframes | 317 or 602 hitmarks | x10 or x1 hits | Resizable and Fullscreen) Money pouch F2P Arena!

item.title: Lost-Legacy
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Lol in the last picture in your PM with that guy, it looked like you didn’t give a shiet what he had to say

Anyway, image quality aside, it looks alright. I won’t play it as I dislike the graphics but goodluck

Read full topic

Lost-Legacy is a 317 server loading higher revision data, we mix our data giving you different revisions of maps and items so that we can optimise our content.

At Lost-Legacy we strive for perfection, we understand even the smallest bug is important and we gain great pleasure from being able to confidently say we
update more than almost any other server out there and we plan to keep it this way, don’t believe us? Check up our update board! Our staff team at Lost-Legacy
comes with a vast amount of experience and professionalism and are always looking to help, even us owners will dedicate a portion of our busy day to
come in-game and answer questions and communicate with the players as we believe this to be part of the key to a successful and thriving community.
So come join us, check us out and see what you’re missing out on. We’re full of unique fun content and you may even make a friend or two.
